name: bigquery-runner
description: An extension for querying Google Cloud Platform's BigQuery analytics datasets directly from VS Code.

commands.title: BigQuery Runner: Run
commands.description: Run the query with BigQuery and display the results. Run the query on the selected text if text is selected, or on the entire file if no text is selected.

commands.title: BigQuery Runner: Dry Run
commands.description: Run the dry run query with BigQuery and display the result. Run the query on the selected text if text is selected, or on the entire file if no text is selected.

bigqueryRunner.keyFilename.description: The path to the JSON file for the service account. When specifying a relative path, specify the path from the root folder that is open in VSCode. If it is not specified, the path specified in `GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS` is used.

bigqueryRunner.projectId.description: Project ID for Google Cloud Platform. If not specified, the value of `project_id` in the JSON file of the service account will be used.

bigqueryRunner.location.description: The geographic location where the job should run. See details at https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/locations#specifying_your_location.

bigqueryRunner.useLegacySql.description: Flag whether to use legacy SQL. If `false`, use standard SQL.

bigqueryRunner.maximumBytesBilled.description: Limits the bytes billed for this query. Queries with bytes billed above this limit will fail (without incurring a charge). If unspecified, the project default is used.

bigqueryRunner.queryValidation.enabled.description: Validate the query whenever the file set in `queryValidation.languageIds` or `queryValidation.extensions` is modified.

bigqueryRunner.queryValidation.debounceI.description: Debounce interval in milliseconds to validate the query when the file is modified.

bigqueryRunner.queryValidation.languageI.description: List of language IDs of the files whose queries are to be validated when the files are modified.

bigqueryRunner.queryValidation.extension.description: List of file extensions for which the query is to be validated when the file is modified.

bigqueryRunner.format.type.description: Controls the output format for query results.

bigqueryRunner.format.csv.header.description: Columns names are automatically discovered from the first record if it is provided as a literal object.

bigqueryRunner.format.csv.delimiter.description: Set the delimiter between the fields of a record. It can be one or multiple characters. The default value is a comma `,`

bigqueryRunner.output.type.description: Controls the output destination for query results.

bigqueryRunner.output.file.path.description: Controls the output file path for query results when output.type is specified as file.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run -w gencode generate && npm run -w core compile:publish && npm run -w viewer build
